name: AI Summit
date: Conferences held year-round in different cities

name: CES
description: Large scale non-AI specific conference where innovation and technology from large companies are often unveiled.

description: Smaller-scale AI focused conference featuring speakers from AI-centric positions in large companies.

name: Michigan AI Symposium
location: University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI
description: Smaller-scale event with research-focused talks, posters and demos.

name: AI4

name: AI for Business Summit
description: AI conference focusing on the application of AI in a variety of businesses.
